1.title: Pilot
1.plot: A meeting is called to hear the best employee's marketing ideas.

2.title: Lord of the Ties
2.plot: Corporate comes and challenges the leadership.

3.title: Bridezilla
3.plot: The team tries to ease tension when designing a celebrity's wedding dress.

4.title: A Doll's House
4.plot: Dana seeks counsel with Julia on the tailor's worst day.

5.title: The Photographer
5.plot: The fashion photographer Eric makes a surprise visit to Dana.

6.title: Of Mice and Men
6.plot: LADY puts on a fashion show to user in a new phase for the company, but it doesn't go according to plan.

7.title: A Clockwork Peach
7.plot: The failed fashion show send rifts through the company, Dana feels like she is losing her grip.

imdb.plot outline: LADY is the story of Dana Gordon, a cold yet brilliantly cunning fashion designer on top of the world. But after a failed marketing campaign, those who would love to see her crumble circle in like starving sharks. Her colleagues Dylan and Chastity come to her aid, but as more secrets of the failed launch and her own personal life rise to the surface, others like Henri and Kyung seek to flake out and leave Dana holding the bag. Dana knows that her enemies are closing in, but seeks help with the aid of her mentor Sam, LADY's gifted seamstress. Determined to overcome her foes, Dana throws one of the biggest fashion shows in the city. Will the fashion show be a success and save the company in time? Will Dana learn to open her heart to her friends, or will she cling to her pride and watch the world burn?
imdb.title: Lady
plot: A fashion company lead by a tenacious businesswoman seeks to become the greatest designers in this century. However, the perfect façade is hiding dark secrets.::Derek Ziarkowski
